Oakley Canopy '12

SKU: #8188278
Danny Kass Canopy Peace Pipe w/Fire IridiumTanner Hall Canopy Rasta Mane w/Fire Iridium
  • Play Video

Product Information

  • This item is subject to quantity limitations.
  • Sit on top of the world and feel free with the Oakley™ Canopy snow goggles.
  • Large lens design expands peripheral view in every direction.
  • Optimized to fit medium to large faces.
  • Fog elimination of dual vented lenses with F3 Anti-fog technology.
  • O-Flow Arch allows for easy breathing and unrestricted airflow.
  • Streamlined frame design provides full helmet compatibility.
  • UV protection of Plutonite and regular lens that filters out 100% of UVA/ UVB/ UVC and harmful blue light up to 400nm.
  • Includes a soft case.
  • Imported.
  • Measurements:
    • Frame Width: 186 mm
    • Lens Height: 87 mm
    • Weight: 5.84 oz
    • Lens Width: 99 mm
    • Bridge: 17 mm
